title: Dr. Brandon Bowers on NFL injuries, fantasy football drafts (Football 08/29)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Dr. Brandon Bowers, a sports injury analyst and expert for CBS Sports and SportsLine, to talk about what kind of expectations we should have for various players who are battling injuries either from last year or before the season, including Doug Baldwin, Rashaad Penny, David Johnson, Carson Wentz, Deshaun Watson, Andrew Luck and several more. Will also breaks down the latest news and notes and recaps the latest episode of Hard Knocks.
